Author: DriftlessDigits
Name: Scrooge
Punchline: A gil saved is a gil earned.
Description: "You might say that everythin's for sale here in Ul'dah — as long as you've got the gil." — Momodi Modi
Changelog: Added Pinch Run Summary — run start/end markers with timestamps and a per-run summary showing items adjusted, skipped, outliers detected, and total gil on market.
